verses.roman:
punaḥ śuka kahe,--kṛṣṇa 'madana-mohana'
tabe āra śloka śuka karila paṭhana

synonyms: punaḥ—again; śuka—the male parrot; kahe—says; kṛṣṇa madana-mohana—Kṛṣṇa is the conqueror of the mind of Cupid; tabe—thereafter; āra—another; śloka—verse; śuka—the male parrot; karila paṭhana—recited.
translation: Thereafter the male parrot said,"Kṛṣṇa is the enchanter of the mind of Cupid." He then began to recite another verse.
